General.Name: Sinotruk Jinan Truck Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinotruk Jinan Truck Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells heavy-duty trucks, special vehicles, buses, special vehicles and engines, transmissions, axles, assemblies, and parts in China. The company offers its products under the SITRAK, HOWO, HOHAN, STEYR, WANGPAI, and FOLOR brand names. It also exports its products to approximately 110 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as CNHTC Jinan Truck Co.,Ltd. Sinotruk Jinan Truck Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jinan, China. Sinotruk Jinan Truck Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Sinotruk (Hong Kong) Limited.
General.Address: South of Dangjiazhuang Town, Jinan, China, 250116
